segments.text: I notice the cozy kitchen setup with the open cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in the apron is drying dishes so diligently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's nice to see such a domestic moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is full and water is pouring over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right there, unaware of the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water puddle, yet she keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the counter, the boy is on a step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's sneaking cookies from the jar, what a clever kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up, excited for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles, but they're having fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in light from the pretty garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This reminds me of childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but it's adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow might ruin the fun though.
segments.speaker: PAR
